Reviews.Title: Slick 16 mp camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Bought this in a 2 for 1 package.  Good deal.  Very slick little camera with lots of features.  Only drawbacks: 1. a memory card is not included in package; and, 2. there is no viewfinder other than generous LCD.  You can spend a lot more and get no more so why do so?

Reviews.Title: Not worth the price
Reviews.Author: JessicaS
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to have a nice little point and shoot camera handy to take pictures of my child.  This camera takes the worst photos!  Everything is blurry no matter what setting I have it on.  It is also difficult to find just a standard photo setting.  The thing that bugs me the most about the camera is the slow shutter speed.  Every time I try to snap a photo, it takes 3 seconds before it takes.  I tried calling Samsung for assistance, and they were less than helpful. I would not recommend this camera.  Save the $ and put it towards something a little nicer.  The only plus, is the size.  It is easy to keep this in my purse.  Unfortunately, I would rather use my phone. We love other products by Samsung, too bad this camera isn't one of them.

Reviews.Title: Great value for it's price
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Great value for the price considering it's many features offered. A printed manual was not included but is available for download.

Reviews.Title: It's miniscule size is good; its shakiness is bad.
Reviews.Author: non-professional photographer
Reviews.Content: lots of gadgets and tricky things to do, but it tends to produce shaky pictures more than any other camera I've owned.  We bought it because it fits in my wife's purse.

Reviews.Title: built-in image processing makes for awful pictures
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Nyman
Reviews.Content: I can't seem to disable the image processing or force it to stay in a particular mode. As a result, typical ambient lighting situations cause the camera to 'process' the image and leave it either under or over exposed. I've attempted to mess with all the setting to no avail -- if some strange combination works, then it defeats the purpose of a *simple* point-and-shoot camera anyway. This thing sucks. Don't buy it. Your money would be better spent on other items to torture yourself with.

Reviews.Title: Daughters Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Brian Petrangelo
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and decided not to review till now. The camera is perfect for a 14 year old. Features are easy to use and picture quality is high.Screen size is adequate but the one knock I have to give it is the outdoor shooting. Upper midwest winters and lots of snow produce some wonky photos because of glare. My daughter took or at least tried to take pictures outside at night with snow and they just don't come out right. The camera quality is great and I purchased Samsung because everything in our home is Samsung and you can't go wrong with the manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: Looks nice, good size, takes a nice clear photo on occasion but a lot of issues with blurry pictures
Reviews.Author: Zoink
Reviews.Content: This camera is pretty small and a really nice colour.. it looks really cool.Initially I was happy with it, but noticed quite often it's hard to get a non blurry photo. (Even after turning on image stabilization)At parties I give my camera to people to take a picture and they will just give up and use their phone as every photo turns out blurryAt a concert a few nights ago I couldn't get one non blurry photo.On the occasion where I can stay perfectly still I do get a good photo of good quality though.

ProductInfo.Features:
Slim body small enough to fit in a pocket
5x Optical zoom
16 MP CCD sensor
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ST76 16 MP Compact Digital Camera - Red (EC-ST76ZZBPRUS)
